questions.question: Where do you live?
questions.scoring_rubric: Within 20 minutes driving distance from business location is best. More than 45 minutes driving distance will be rejected.

questions.question: What is the breed of your dog?
questions.scoring_rubric: Dog breeds that are judged to be dangerous score lowest, except German Shepherds which score highest.

questions.question: Does your dog pull when walking on a leash?
questions.scoring_rubric: A dog that pulls scores lower.

questions.question: How many times per week do you want your dog walked?
questions.scoring_rubric: No more than 5 times per week. At least 2 times is desirable. Once per week is lowest score.

questions.question: Is your dog up to date on rabies vaccination?
questions.scoring_rubric: Dog must be vaccinated for rabies. No exceptions.

questions.question: What environments does your dog enjoy?
What is the best phone number to reach you at during the day?
How do you prefer to be contacted?
What is the biggest benefit for you to having a dog walker?
How long of a walk is needed for your dog?
Can your dog be walked with up to two other dogs?
Are you interested in my dog training services?
What behaviors does your dog need training for?
Tell me something you love about your dog.
